content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace (position 6.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace is full, which prevents further insertion of items.

### Errors when attempting to insert items without sufficient inventory
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace. The error indicates that there was an attempt to insert iron ore when none was available in the inventory.

### Errors when using coal as fuel
- Check the inventory of the furnace before adding coal. If the furnace is already full of coal, it will not accept more.
